uav_flocking_tracking Class Reference

An implementation of the tracking class that allows to track a target by minimizing the offset between the cyber physical system (CPS) and the target. More...

Detailed Description

An implementation of the tracking class that allows to track a target by minimizing the offset between the cyber physical system (CPS) and the target.
